scripts.start:disaster-api: cd disaster-api && npm ci & npm run start
scripts.start:phoneNumber-api: cd phoneNumber-api && npm ci && npm run start
scripts.start:ui: cd ui && npm ci && npm run dev
scripts.start:chain: cd proto-kit/packages/chain && pnpm install && pnpm run dev
scripts.demo: npm run start:ui & npm run start:disaster-api & npm run start:phoneNumber-api & npm run start:ui
